body_html:
@jart could you take a look at the summary portion to see if you find anything obvious there?

I don't see obvious leak.

Could you run with the env variable TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL=1 *look at anything with __LOG_MEMORY__ and tf.RunOptions(trace_level=tf.RunOptions.FULL_TRACE)?

#1824 is a good example of debugging.
body_text:
@jart could you take a look at the summary portion to see if you find anything obvious there?
I don't see obvious leak.
Could you run with the env variable TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL=1 *look at anything with __LOG_MEMORY__ and tf.RunOptions(trace_level=tf.RunOptions.FULL_TRACE)?
#1824 is a good example of debugging.
body:
@jart could you take a look at the summary portion to see if you find anything obvious there?

I don't see obvious leak.

Could you run with the env variable `TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL=1` *look at anything with `__LOG_MEMORY__` and `tf.RunOptions(trace_level=tf.RunOptions.FULL_TRACE)`?

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1824 is a good example of debugging.
